meanings.definition: The action or process of supplying nerves to a body part.
meanings.sent1: The innervations of the hand allow us to feel sensations.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the innervations of the spinal cord to understand nerve function.
meanings.sent3: The innervations of the brain were so excited, they threw a party!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the innervations of joy spreading through the room.
meanings.sent5: The innervations of the tree roots reached deep into the earth for nutrients.

meanings.definition: The stimulation of a nerve or muscle.
meanings.sent1: Physical therapy helps improve the innervations of weakened muscles.
meanings.sent2: The innervations of the leg muscles are crucial for movement.
meanings.sent3: The innervations of the guitar strings created beautiful music.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as innervations, sparking inspiration in the team.
meanings.sent5: The innervations of excitement ran through her body as she won the race.
